name: Cracked
description:
Wishlist and follow, if you're interested in Cracked


Cracked is a difficult 2D Platformer. Dominate the leaderboards by completing the maps as fast as possible. Explore the abandoned Factory, the desert Pyramid and the jungle Temple.

EXPLORE VARIOUS LOCATIONS

  • From all the locations, you can choose which one to explore first.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR CHARACTER

  • It's up to you how you want to customize your character.

DOMINATE THE LEADERBOARDS

  • Finish the maps as fast as you can and put your name on the leaderboard.
  • You can either compete against your own personal best, your friends or the world.

DEFEAT THE BOSS

  • Save your friends by defeating the boss in every campaign's last map, and unlock them as a playable character.
  • It's your choice who you think is worthy of being saved first.


https://store.steampowered.com/app/2130750/Cracked/
